contribution_desc:
SenScreen, a toolkit that enables developers or large / public display applications to access low-level sensor information (e.g. tracking data from a Kinect or Leap Motion) through a high level Javascript API. 

"To this server, arbitrary sensors via so-called adapters can be connected.
An API on the server enables client applications to obtain sensor data in a number of different formats."

Multiple displays can use the same sensor information through accessing the server's API.
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Location 3D; Tracking users only
tracking_tech: Kinect; Leap Motion; Asus Wavi Xtion; arbitrary - can be plugged in via adapters
